definition: guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] (a type of zither)/musical instrument in general
guqin or qin, a long zither with seven strings, plucked with the fingers
to play or strum a lute or other stringed instrument
instrument of the violin family (violin, viola, cello or double bass)/CL:把[ba3]
the four arts (zither, Go, calligraphy, painting)/the accomplishments of a well-educated person

sentences.english: Yes, China has some good luthiers making handmade concert quality guitars.
sentences.chinese: 是的，中國現在有很多好琴師在製作手工演奏會琴。

sentences.english: On the way we were given readymade gin and tonics.
sentences.chinese: 在去的路上，我們喝了現成的琴湯尼酒。

sentences.english: You can measure Kum value, but music is everybody's.
sentences.chinese: 你可以衡量琴的價值，但音樂是屬於大家的。

sentences.english: But the difference may not all be in the mind.
sentences.chinese: 不過，新舊琴的區別也許不僅在心理感覺。

sentences.english: When Lincoln and Sucre arrive at the pier, Gretchen and Self are gone.
sentences.chinese: 林肯和蘇克雷趕到碼頭，格雷琴和賽爾夫已經離開了。

sentences.english: Follow of Kelaili only the mandolin musical instrument with a lonely divert oneself from loneliness or boredom.
sentences.chinese: 跟隨柯萊利的唯有一把排遣孤寂的曼陀林琴。

sentences.english: I felt so ashamed of you.
Well, it's an erhu, a kind of fiddle played with a bow.
sentences.chinese: 那叫二胡，是一種用弓演奏的琴。

sentences.english: Lincoln calls Gretchen and fills her in on Self's double-cross.
sentences.chinese: 林肯格打給格雷琴，將賽爾夫的出賣告訴了她。

sentences.english: How did you get the best sound out of your vina?
sentences.chinese: 你怎麼把琴演奏出最美妙的音樂？

sentences.english: Lack of progress is the main reason why so many students quit piano.
sentences.chinese: 沒有進步是大多數學生放棄學琴的主因。

sentences.english: As Gretchen descends down the stairwell, Sucre attacks her.
sentences.chinese: 格雷琴走下樓梯，蘇克雷向她襲擊。

sentences.english: When she finished playing the piano, Liszt pointed out a few small mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 她彈完琴後，李斯特給她指出了多少個小毛病。

sentences.english: A pear-shaped, two-stringed or three-stringed medieval instrument, played with a bow.
sentences.chinese: 雷貝克琴中世紀的一種樂器，梨型琴身，有兩。

sentences.english: Mara Hvistendahl is a Shanghai-based freelance writer.
sentences.chinese: 馬語琴是駐在上海的自由撰稿作家。

sentences.english: The Akhal–Tekes come from the Kara–Kum Desert in Turkmenia.
sentences.chinese: 在阿哈爾，特克斯從卡拉來，琴在土庫曼沙漠。

definition: xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes
guzheng or long zither/long zither with 13 to 16 strings, developed from guqin 古琴 during Tang and Song times/Japanese koto
guqin or qin, a long zither with seven strings, plucked with the fingers
pipa, Chinese lute, with 4 strings, a large pear-shaped body and a fretted fingerboard
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
sheng, a free reed wind instrument with vertical bamboo pipes
ocarina/wind instrument consisting of an egg-shaped chamber with holes
yueqin, a lute with oval or octagonal sound box
